ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:07:42 [Issue ID 4000-501750] urn:comicvine:4000-501750 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 12:07:40. [Issue ID 1653991]
ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Oz: Reign of the Witch Queen
ComicInfo.Summary:
The epic OZ trilogy CONTINUES! The Heroes of Oz have finally vanquished Warlord, only to find that their victory was all part of Zamora's plan to fully corrupt her daughter, Dorothy Gale! Once upon a time, all of Oz suffered under the terrible thrall of the Witch Queen; what hope have they now against the most powerful mother-daughter combo in the history of the Four Realms?

Note: The digital edition (9/30/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: Counterweight
